description: They worked with artist Jaime Molina to create a stylish Merino wool tee that helps takes you farther. Jaime infused his unique, folksy stlyle and personal heritage into this shirt to bring more passion, color, and comfort to all your outdoor adventures. Enjoy the natural performance of responsibly sourced wool and the quick dry time of recycled polyester every time you put this gear on.
name: Smartwool Memory Quilt SS Graphic Tee Guitar - Mens
